title: Rainy city driving with multiple braking events.

There are other cars on the road, including a white van and a parked truck. The traffic lights are visible and display red and green lights. The pedestrians are also present on the sidewalk.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly down the rainy city street because of the hardRainNoon weather conditions and the multiple braking events.
